title: Sample application with Angular, Firebase, and MongoDB
description:
Built as a sample application with Angular.js, Laravel 4, Firebase, and MongoDB. Sample app supports user authentication and user content managment.

All client-side CRUD functions are handled in Angularjs controllers and all server-side logics are written in PHP (Laravel framework). Database is implemented in MongoDB, NoSQL database.The application is also hosted online.

App's CRUD fuctionalities:

  • Create, update, and delete articles
  • Post comments
  • Comments are save on Firebase
  • Upload user avatar image
  • Upload images
  • Create, edit, and delete people's contact informations

Usage (sample account):

Username: user@mail.com
Password: password

Installation:

To install this app, you need to clone this project from github - here is link:
after cloning, run this command from terminal to install dependencies:
$ composer install
